languages.text: "Стой!" {n}Идира, кажется, сама изумляется своему выкрику.{/n} "Арджента... стой. Подожди. Мне тревожно. Этот корабль... в нем правда что-то есть. Что-то огромное, меняющее судьбы. Если ты войдешь внутрь — не выйдешь совсем. Или не выйдешь прежней".

traits.locale_text: "Стой!" {n}Идира, кажется, сама изумляется своему выкрику.{/n} "Арджента... стой. Подожди. Мне тревожно. Этот корабль... в нем правда что-то есть. Что-то огромное, меняющее судьбы. Если ты войдешь внутрь — не выйдешь совсем. Или не выйдешь прежней".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wait!" {n}Idira looks like she has surprised herself with her outburst.{/n} "Argenta... wait. Please. I feel uneasy. This ship... there really is something inside it. Something big, something that changes people's fates. If you go in, you won't come back out. Or at least the you who comes out won't be the same you."
languages.original_text: "Стой!" {n}Идира, кажется, сама изумляется своему выкрику.{/n} "Арджента... стой. Подожди. Мне тревожно. Этот корабль... в нем правда что-то есть. Что-то огромное, меняющее судьбы. Если ты войдешь внутрь — не выйдешь совсем. Или не выйдешь прежней".

languages.text: 「待って！」{n}イディラは自分の声に驚いたように見えた。{/n}「アルジェンタ…待って。お願い。なんだか落ち着かないの。この船…本当に中に何かいる。何か大きな、人の運命を変えてしまうような何かが。中に入ったら、きっと出てこられないわ。出てこられたとしても、その時は今の同じあなたじゃない」
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Idira looks like she has surprised herself with her outburst.{/n} "Argenta... wait. Please. I feel uneasy. This ship... there really is something inside it. Something big, something that changes people's fates. If you go in, you won't come back out. Or at least the you who comes out won't be the same you."

traits.locale_text: 「待って！」{n}イディラは自分の声に驚いたように見えた。{/n}「アルジェンタ…待って。お願い。なんだか落ち着かないの。この船…本当に中に何かいる。何か大きな、人の運命を変えてしまうような何かが。中に入ったら、きっと出てこられないわ。出てこられたとしても、その時は今の同じあなたじゃない」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “等等！”{n}伊迪拉高喊起来，似乎连她自己都惊讶不已。{/n}“阿洁塔……等等，拜托。我心里很不安，这艘船……这里面确实有些东西，某些很重要的东西，会改变所有人的命运。一旦你进去了，就再也出不来了。或者说，等你再出来的时候，你已经不再是原来的你了。”
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Idira looks like she has surprised herself with her outburst.{/n} "Argenta... wait. Please. I feel uneasy. This ship... there really is something inside it. Something big, something that changes people's fates. If you go in, you won't come back out. Or at least the you who comes out won't be the same you."

traits.locale_text: “等等！”{n}伊迪拉高喊起来，似乎连她自己都惊讶不已。{/n}“阿洁塔……等等，拜托。我心里很不安，这艘船……这里面确实有些东西，某些很重要的东西，会改变所有人的命运。一旦你进去了，就再也出不来了。或者说，等你再出来的时候，你已经不再是原来的你了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Pas si vite ! » {n}s'exclame Idira en semblant la première surprise par son intervention inattendue.{/n} « Réfléchissez, Argenta... Je vous en conjure. J'ai un mauvais pressentiment. Ce vaisseau... il y a bel et bien quelque chose à l'intérieur. Quelque chose d'énorme, quelque chose qui altère la destinée de ceux qui y pénètrent. Si vous y entrez, vous n'en reviendrez pas. Ou alors, vous en ressortirez changée à jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Idira looks like she has surprised herself with her outburst.{/n} "Argenta... wait. Please. I feel uneasy. This ship... there really is something inside it. Something big, something that changes people's fates. If you go in, you won't come back out. Or at least the you who comes out won't be the same you."

traits.locale_text: « Pas si vite ! » {n}s'exclame Idira en semblant la première surprise par son intervention inattendue.{/n} « Réfléchissez, Argenta... Je vous en conjure. J'ai un mauvais pressentiment. Ce vaisseau... il y a bel et bien quelque chose à l'intérieur. Quelque chose d'énorme, quelque chose qui altère la destinée de ceux qui y pénètrent. Si vous y entrez, vous n'en reviendrez pas. Ou alors, vous en ressortirez changée à jamais. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Alto!». {n}Idira parece sorprendida por su propio exabrupto.{/n} «Argenta... espere. Por favor. Estoy intranquila. Esta nave... Es cierto que hay algo dentro. Es algo grande, que cambia el destino de la gente. Si entra, no volverá a salir. O, por lo menos, no será la misma cuando salga».
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Idira looks like she has surprised herself with her outburst.{/n} "Argenta... wait. Please. I feel uneasy. This ship... there really is something inside it. Something big, something that changes people's fates. If you go in, you won't come back out. Or at least the you who comes out won't be the same you."

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto!». {n}Idira parece sorprendida por su propio exabrupto.{/n} «Argenta... espere. Por favor. Estoy intranquila. Esta nave... Es cierto que hay algo dentro. Es algo grande, que cambia el destino de la gente. Si entra, no volverá a salir. O, por lo menos, no será la misma cuando salga».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wartet!" {n}Idira wirkt, als hätte sie sich mit ihrem Ausbruch selbst überrascht.{/n} "Argenta ... wartet. Bitte. Ich habe ein ungutes Gefühl. Dieses Schiff ... im Inneren befindet sich wirklich etwas. Etwas Großes, das das Schicksal der Menschen verändert. Wenn Ihr hineingeht, werdet Ihr nicht mehr herauskommen. Und wenn Ihr doch herauskommt, werdet Ihr nicht mehr dieselbe sein."
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Idira looks like she has surprised herself with her outburst.{/n} "Argenta... wait. Please. I feel uneasy. This ship... there really is something inside it. Something big, something that changes people's fates. If you go in, you won't come back out. Or at least the you who comes out won't be the same you."

traits.locale_text: "Wartet!" {n}Idira wirkt, als hätte sie sich mit ihrem Ausbruch selbst überrascht.{/n} "Argenta ... wartet. Bitte. Ich habe ein ungutes Gefühl. Dieses Schiff ... im Inneren befindet sich wirklich etwas. Etwas Großes, das das Schicksal der Menschen verändert. Wenn Ihr hineingeht, werdet Ihr nicht mehr herauskommen. Und wenn Ihr doch herauskommt, werdet Ihr nicht mehr dieselbe sein."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Dur!" {n}Ani çıkışı yüzünden İdira'nın kendisi de şaşırmış gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Argenta... Bekle. Lütfen. Huzursuz hissediyorum. Bu geminin içinde... Gerçekten bir şey var. Büyük bir şey... İnsanların kaderini değiştiren bir şey. İçeri girersen bir daha dışarı çıkamayacaksın. Daha doğrusu... Çıkan sen, giren senin aynısı olmayacak."
languages.original_text: "Wait!" {n}Idira looks like she has surprised herself with her outburst.{/n} "Argenta... wait. Please. I feel uneasy. This ship... there really is something inside it. Something big, something that changes people's fates. If you go in, you won't come back out. Or at least the you who comes out won't be the same you."

traits.locale_text: "Dur!" {n}İdira, ani çıkışı yüzünden kendisi de şaşırmış gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Argenta... Bekle. Lütfen. Huzursuz hissediyorum. Bu geminin içinde... Gerçekten bir şey var. Büyük bir şey... İnsanların kaderini değiştiren bir şey. İçeri girersen bir daha dışarı çıkamayacaksın. Daha doğrusu... Çıkan kişi, giren hâlinle aynı olmayacak."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
